benchmark_details.name: GeoSense
benchmark_details.overview: GeoSense is the first comprehensive bilingual benchmark designed to systematically evaluate the geometric reasoning abilities of multimodal large language models (MLLMs) through the lens of geometric principles.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the reasoning abilities of MLLMs with a focus on identifying and applying geometric principles.

data.source: Curated dataset of geometric math problems sourced from existing benchmarks and educational websites.
data.annotation: Annotated by 23 experts using a semi-automated pipeline.

methodology.calculation: GPI and GPA scores reflect the model's performance in identifying and applying geometric principles within the visual context.
methodology.interpretation: Higher GPI and GPA scores indicate better reasoning capabilities in geometric problem-solving.
methodology.baseline_results: Gemini-2.0-pro-flash achieved an overall score of 65.3.
